Managers¶

Manager base class¶

Manager is used by ModelResource to implement a backend integration.

class flask_restone.Manager(resource, model)¶
filter_class¶

alias of _BaseFilter

static filters_for_fields(fields, filters_expression, field_filters_dict, filters_name_dict)¶

搜刮每个字段可用的过滤器 meta.filters = {“name”:{},”*”:{}} 废弃，需要指明过滤器的类 meta.filters = {“name”:[“eq”,”ne”],”*”:{}} meta.filters = (“name”,”id”)

Parameters:

  • fields – 字段实例

  • filters_expression – 资源指定的过滤器

  • field_filters_dict – 字段可用过滤器字典

  • filters_name_dict – 过滤字名称字典

Returns:

Manager implementations¶

The following backend managers ship with Flask-Restone:

class flask_restone.SQLAlchemyManager(resource, model)¶
filter_class¶

alias of _SQLAlchemyFilter

Additionally, SQLAlchemyManager can be extended with PrincipalsMixin to form a new manager that implements a permissions system based on Flask-Principals.
